messages.messageBody:
>
>
> From: "Raymond KING" <ray@...>
>Subject: mongol invasions film
>
>hello group,
> can anyone tell me has there ever been a film made about the mongol invasions of japan in the thirteenth century?
>
At least one that I forgot the name of as well as a TV series Hojo Tokimune.

> From: "William&Mikiko Letham" <mickey.letham@...>
>
>
Better info than mine! I think there's something more recent, but
wasurechatta!

Jim
